accountItem.regularWarning: Removing this address doesn't delete your recovery phrase or any private keys. Instead it just hides it from the extension and you won't be able to use it until you add it back.
accountItem.loudWarningTitle: Removing this address will remove its associated account from the UI.
accountItem.loudWarningBody: Are you sure you want to proceed?
accountItem.lastAccountWarningTitle: Once this account is removed you won't be able to use the wallet until you complete onboarding again.
accountItem.lastAccountWarningBody: Are you sure you want to proceed?
accountItem.removeConfirm: Yes, I want to remove it
accountItem.clearConfirm: Yes, I want to clear it
accountItem.clearHistoryWarning: Clearing your wallet history in this extension does not delete transaction records from the blockchain. Your transaction history remains publicly visible on the blockchain and can be viewed using block explorers.

priceImpactTooltip.firstLine: Price impact between assets is high.
priceImpactTooltip.secondLine: This is due to low liquidity of the swap pair.

noAssetPriceTooltip.firstLine: We're not able to receive prices for these assets now.
noAssetPriceTooltip.secondLine: Continuing without price information might lead to a loss in value.

dappConnection.createTransactionPermission: Create but not sign transactions for you

genericPages.pageDoesNotExist: This page does not exist. That's all we know.

setPassword.title: Set unlock signing password
setPassword.subtitleFirstLine: You will be asked to enter this

error.invalidCharacters: Password can only contain letters, numbers, and special characters

unlock.title: Unlock signing
unlock.subtitle: Enter your signing password to continue

errors.limitTooLow: Gas Limit must be higher than 21000
errors.invalidLimit: Gas Limit must be a number

newSeed.tip: If you want an easy way to preview Pelagus, you can start by adding a read only account.

addWallet.tip: Several of Pelagus's most popular features were developed by our community.

viewOnly.tip: A good way to take a peek at what Pelagus offers.

importSeed.tip: Pelagus offers the possibility of adding multiple recovery phrases.

default.fact1: Pelagus Wallet, the first web wallet for Quai Network is coming soon.

addWallet.title: Use existing wallet
addWallet.tip: You can always add more wallets later.

importSeed.title: Import secret recovery phrase
importSeed.subtitle: Paste or type your 12 to 24 word secret recovery phrase below.

errors.phraseLengthError: Must be a 12 or 24 word recovery phrase

importPrivateKey.title: Import private key
importPrivateKey.subtitle: Importing a private key does not associate it to a secret recovery phrase, but it’s still protected by the same password

viewOnly.title: Read-only address
viewOnly.subtitle: Add an QUAI address to view an existing wallet in Pelagus
viewOnly.tip: You can upgrade a read-only wallet later.

newWalletIntro.title: Before we get started
newWalletIntro.warning:
It's important to write down your secret recovery phrase and store it somewhere safe.

This is the only way to recover your accounts and funds.

You will not be able to export your recovery phrase later.
newWalletIntro.tip: You can upgrade a read-only wallet later.

newWalletReview.title: Save and store your recovery phrase

newWalletVerify.title: Verify recovery phrase
newWalletVerify.subtitle: Click on each word in the order that you are asked to
newWalletVerify.invalidStateMsg: Verify the order and remove the ones that aren't in the right position.
newWalletVerify.tip: If you didn’t write it down, you can <url>start with a new phrase.</url>

complete.title: Welcome to Pelagus
complete.subtitle: To avoid conflicts with other wallets, we recommend that you turn off all other wallet extensions.

seedVerification.seedMismatchExplainer: We are sorry, the recovery phrase you entered did not match. You can try to re-order them, but make sure you have them written down.
seedVerification.createNewWallet: If you prefer you can <1><0>create a new wallet.<0></1>
seedVerification.successExplainer: Secret recovery phrase is correct and you can now start using your new wallet.

passwordStrength.hintDesc: For a strong password, consider a mix of lower and uppercase characters, symbols, and numbers. Passwords should be over 8 characters.

exportLogs.title: Bug report
exportLogs.discordDesc: Visit us on our Discord channel, and report your bug there. Make sure to include the logs.
exportLogs.logDesc: To better understand your bug, we need you to export your logs.

analyticsSetUp.title: Analytics
analyticsSetUp.toggleDesc: Analytics help us understand your needs and empower us to build a better wallet for you

analyticsOffSlideUpMenu.title: Turn Analytics off?
analyticsOffSlideUpMenu.desc: Are you sure you want to turn analytics off?
analyticsOffSlideUpMenu.snackbar: Analytics are off, re-enable at any time

deleteSlideUpMenu.title: Delete your data?
deleteSlideUpMenu.desc: Are you sure you want to delete your data?
deleteSlideUpMenu.snackbar: Private data will be removed soon

addCustomAssetSettings.title: Add custom asset
addCustomAssetSettings.input.contractAddress.label: Contract address
addCustomAssetSettings.input.tooltip:
Find the asset on your favorite block explorer, then copy the contract address here.

Haven't done this before? Check out Knowledge Center first.
addCustomAssetSettings.warning.alreadyExists.title: Asset already exists, you will see it once your balance is over 0
addCustomAssetSettings.warning.alreadyExists.desc: If you still have issues seeing an asset, turn off “Hide asset balances under 2$” from Settings
addCustomAssetSettings.warning.dust.title: Asset balance is under <$2, you wil see it once your balance is over $2
addCustomAssetSettings.snackbar.failed: Failed to look up token details
addCustomAssetSettings.footer.hint: How to add a custom asset

signing.dappSignatureRequest: A dapp is requesting your signature

spendApproval.title: Approve asset spend
spendApproval.tooltip1: Spend limit is the amount of funds from a particular asset that you allow a contract to spend.
spendApproval.tooltip2: Infinite tx has the drawback that if the contract is malicious, it can steal all your funds.

switchWallet.title: Want to use another wallet instead?
switchWallet.tooltip: You are seeing this because Pelagus is set as default wallet, you can change this option in the main menu.

guideline.title: How to connect to dapps
guideline.step2: Click “connect to wallet” in a dapp

activities.defaultHistoricalActivityExplainer: All of your new transactions will show up here.
activities.endOfList: You have reached the end of activity list.

wallet.sendToContractWarning: This is a contract address, sending assets could result in loss of funds.

defaultToggle.snackbar: You can change this in Settings later
defaultToggle.tooltip: Setting Pelagus as your default wallet means that every time you connect to a dApp, Pelagus will open instead of MetaMask or other wallets.

analyticsNotification.title: Analytics are enabled
analyticsNotification.description: They help us improve the wallet.  You can disable anytime

banner.description: Be aware of scam and spam assets, only interact with assets you trust.
banner.oldDescription: Only transact with assets you trust.

switchWallet.title: Pelagus not Default
switchWallet.descFirstPart: We disabled Pelagus as default wallet for you. You can always enable it back from Settings

defaultConnectionPopover.title: Connecting with Pelagus
defaultConnectionPopover.activeWalletMeaning: This means that you'll be connecting to websites with Pelagus even when selecting MetaMask.
defaultConnectionPopover.toggleLabel: Use the toggle at the top to connect with MetaMask or another wallet.

globalError.title: Ups, nothing to see here
globalError.desc: Looks like you encountered an empty bowl, try refreshing the page to see if something appears

globalModal.title: Hello World. Meet Pelagus.
globalModal.description1: Pelagus is your starter kit to exploring Quai Network.

selectNetwork.title: Select a network
selectNetwork.disabledToggleMessage: Switch to the main network to disable the development environment
